channel.title: My server wont run
channel.description:
I'v done everything i could think of and i cant get it to run...
I'v been trying to make a server and when i go to silab to play it, it say 'error connecting to server' i followed sotrmcutters guide most of the way and gotten help from other peaple but it keeps saying 'error connection to server'
Things iv done
~ downloaded jdk 6u11 ~ got a source (all-star) ~ got a no-ip name (eaglescape.no-ip.org) ~ set my enviroment variables ~ downloaded the no-ip update thing ~ Port forworded ~ turned my firewall off
Thats about it
I'm using all-star source btw
Any help?

item.title: My server wont run
item.dc:creator: @Rober104 Rober104
item.description:
@Rober104 wrote:

naw bro wat it is, jdk 6u11 everyone that has downloaded that i know cannot connect with there servers or anyone else’s servers, better off just going back to jdk 6 u 07 thats wat im about to do now thats about the only way that i know of to fix this bcuzz java 6 u 11 isn’t compatible with 317 servers for some reason. HOPE I HELPED =)

Read full topic

item.title: My server wont run
item.dc:creator: @i_aint_yo_mama i aint yo mama
item.description:
@i_aint_yo_mama wrote:

yes thats stormcutter right? I’ll take another look at it.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2009, 07:37:11 am[/size][hr]Ok i did what it told me to do exept this

Protocol should be tcp.
For ip address fill in your default gateway.
Then check “enable.”

Under ip address it says my default gateway exept for another ‘1’ at the end and it wont let me put ‘1’ and i can only put 3 numbers under ip address.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2009, 07:46:38 am[/size][hr]I have to go to school, just tell me what to do and ill follow it after school please!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

If you follow the guide correctly it will work, also remember to add the port exception “43594,” or whatever port your using in your firewall.

item.title: My server wont run
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

What do you mean your server won’t run, theres an error, or people and or you can’t connect, be more spacific about these types of errors, if it’s a run.bat error make sure you have the correct variables and java installed.

If it’s a portforwarding error make sure you follow the guide at http://www.portforward.com

Read full topic
